website_summaries.verdict: Has an extended range and can monitor up to 6 different meats, although they only start you out with 2 probes.
pros: Probes are good up to 482 degrees Fahrenheit
Well made, and easy to use
Temperature graph in the app is great for monitoring cooking cycle
cons: Some reports of the probes not working or reading incorrectly after a few months
Some buyers felt the alarms were not loud enough

customer_reviews.title: Makes cooking and meat smoking so much easier
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake of ordering a grill thermometer without bluetooth but quickly returned that product and got this Smart Bluetooth item. The multiple probs are a must have when smoking, I use one to just monitor the temps inside the smoker and the others go into the meat. I set the temp ranges which is very easy to do either using the preset temps or adding your customer temps, then I go inside and monitor my iPhone. You will get alarms on your phone for high or low temp setting or when the desired temps are achieved; all of this can be modified very easily. Without this BBQ Grill Thermometer I probably wouldn't enjoy cooking outside near a much.
customer_reviews.author: lzhome

customer_reviews.title: I also love the temperature graph that tells you not only where ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for a Weber unit that I have had for years. It has been trouble-free so far. I have not yet used more than one probe at the same time but it is accurate and well-made. I also love the temperature graph that tells you not only where you are but how quickly you are reaching your target temp which allows for adjustment of the temp if a longer cooking time is desired for tenderness. In all, I am very happy with it and I consider it hands-down better than the Weber (although the Weber was a great thermometer and served me for a lot of years).
customer_reviews.author: S. Becket

customer_reviews.title: This is a great Bluetooth Grill thermometer!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I’ve used several times for smoking and grilling different cuts of meat with excellent results. The graph function in this software makes it very easy to monitor what you were cooking Up to 100 feet away. Great Grill thermometer!I used one probe to monitor the internal temperature of the meet and one to monitor the temperature of the grill itself! Would recommend this to anyone who loves to smoke, Grill Or barbecue.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mccalman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, good product.
customer_reviews.text: The setup of the product was quick and a breeze. Actually using the product was easy and pretty much self-explanatory. The product also seems pretty durable and the quality is great. The product (PWIRBBQ80) also has a few features that are not advertised but, are a welcome addition. Although it is not advertised, the PWIRBBQ80 does ambient temperatures, liquid/soup, and candy. Overall, very satisfied with my purchase. It was exactly what I was looking for; versatility and a great starting point. I will be purchasing 4 additional probes soon (the 2 it comes with are probably enough but, I like to be prepared).
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's really nice. It seems very well built
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a christmas gift for my roommate. It's really nice. It seems very well built, the app works great on our Android phones. If you like data about random, various things, then this is excellent. We've used it at least twice a week for a month now and have not had a single issue. I will probably be buying this for friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Al

customer_reviews.title: The Bluetooth makes this thermometer worthless
customer_reviews.text: The whole idea behind a digital thermometer is to be able to remotely monitor the temperature and watch alarms. The bluetooth feature only allows me to be about 15-20 feet away before it loses connection. Unless I stand on my deck and can see my grill it won't stay connected. The claim of 200' outdoors and 100' indoors is false. I can be standing indoors less than 25' away and looking at my grill through the window and it constantly loses connection. It's not the signal on the phone as the same phone will run bluetooth speakers from two floors away.
customer_reviews.author: Rod A

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3rd use
customer_reviews.text: EDIT FROM ORIGINAL REVIEW: Thought I found a gem. Worked flawlessly 1st time out of the box but stopped working on 3rd use, registering wildly inaccurate temperatures and is now completely useless. See pictures for proof. One probe is reading 91 degrees while the other reads 165 degrees while sitting in ice water. Out of the box I had run the same test and it registered perfectly at just a hair above 32 degrees. Don’t know what happened but I’ll be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Carlie R.

customer_reviews.title: Super easy and simple!
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome! I would definitely recommend this product! I purchased it for my smoker and General grilling needs. I love this because it’s simple and so easy. The app is awesome, tells you what temperature is done for a variety of meats, also gives notification when the meats have reached the exact temperature you want. If you like your meat cooked medium, medium well or whatever, it will tell you the temp it needs to be to reach your desire. I really am glad I purchased this, no more worrying if my food is going to be undercooked! Super simple and great tool to have!!!!
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: The probes are rubbish.
customer_reviews.text: The product looks great, the app is very good, but the probes are unreliable. The whole point of using a thermometer is accuracy, so that makes the system entirely useless. First time round, one probe went haywire and registered 200 F while the other was at 135F. I thought it was bad luck, but the second time I used it, the second one (the working one) also went wonky just after the picture above. Don’t waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It worked great for the first month or so but then the ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for the first month or so but then the probes would be very off on the temp of whatever we were cooking making them completely unusable. Very disappointed and I’d recommend staying clear.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Have tested many. This one is the best so far!
customer_reviews.text: Super simple setup and intuitive app. High quality materials. Worked really well for our thanksgiving day turkey and ham!
customer_reviews.author: Jason B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice try, needs fine tuning.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed this for about 5 minutes. When opening it up and playing around with it I thought it was awesome. I do like that it has an app for monitoring away from the thermometer. However, when it came down to BBQ time, I found the probes very erratic and inaccurate. Also the digital thermometer beeps if it goes above or below your preset temps, which is a great feature, but you GOTTA put a setting for turning the beeping off. It’s annoying as hell. I will be returning this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Bailey

customer_reviews.title: AVOID. I've had to return 2 of these in 1 month
customer_reviews.text: AVOID. Spend your money elsewhere. I've already had to return one of them and about to return the replacement. First one: the LED screen went out during a day where I was smoking on my pellet grill. Guess the cheap design cant stand the Georgia heat Second one: the probes dont work. I have to unplug them and plug them back in multiple times before they actually start working. Just not a good product. I was reeled in with the price but now I feel it's worth spending more money on a better on
customer_reviews.author: RynoCanSea

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I like that you can preset temperatures and save the presets. For example, I have presets for "wrap brisket" at 165 degrees and "brisket ready" at 203 degrees. I struggled a little bit to get it connected to my phone, but finally figured it out. One error the product has is that it keeps listing my preset temperature at 32 degrees on the monitor, even though I might have it set at 145 degrees. Fortunately, my phone app shows the right temperature preset. I hope this doesn't present a problem when I begin cooking.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Good device poor app
customer_reviews.text: I wss very excited when I get this thermometer I plan to use in my bbq business. However after the 2 firsts bbq, where the app worked fine, suddenly startd to crash. Now; everytime my cell pairs with the device the app crashes. I tried restarting the device, restart my cell, reinstalling the app, clearing the device and taking the batteries out. It just keep crashing. So, altough the device is functioning, I have to continuosly go to the grill and check the temperature. This definitely is not what I expected when I bought it. So I consider it a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: carlos ochoa koppel

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to purchase because it did not have a great review and mine came in and it will not even turn on. Finally I tried new batteries not the ones that came with it and the screen turn blue for half a second and that was it. It was also misleading that it only comes with 2 probes although it advertises as if there are 6 probes
customer_reviews.author: michael Keating

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Just got this and opened yesterday. After a full day in kitchen, the probe read 77F. The room is no where near that warm so I did an experiment and stuck the probe in boiling water. Much to my surprise it held at 208F. 4 degrees is quite the discrepancy when cooking. I’m not sure if this is normal or I just got a bad unit, but as of right now I wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Syltraul

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: It works as described. However, a few reviews I read about this product said it can also be used as an ambient air temperature probe for the inside of the BBQ. After having difficulties monitoring the ambient air temperature of the BBQ I called customer service. They said it is designed to work as a meat thermometer. Not meant to monitor the temperature in the BBQ which is what I was looking for so I wouldn't have to keep stepping outside to physically check the BBQ thermometer. They said the high temperatures when preheating the BBQ can damage the sensor.
customer_reviews.author: M. Downs

customer_reviews.title: Stopped turning on after 5 uses
customer_reviews.text: When this worked, it was really cool. Connected to bluetooth quickly/easily, easy to use app. After using it 4-5 times, the thermometer no longer turns on. Replaced the battery, moved the probes, and still nothing. Have contacted Pyle/NutriChef to access the 1 year warranty; will update my review based on how they handle the claim.
customer_reviews.author: Salt

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I discovered this product the day before Thanksgiving, so was too late to use it for my turkey, but I just cooked a tri-tip using it. It is fabulous! I was notified on my phone when the exact temperature was reached. My husband said it was the best tri-tip I'd ever made. I can't wait to use it when cooking a turkey. I cook mine upside down so the breast meat stays moist and it's extremely difficult to get an instant read thermometer in the right place. It won't be an issue with this thermometer. No more over or under cooked turkeys (or any other meat) for me.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Probes are junk.
customer_reviews.text: The probes are junk, one quit working in two months and the other one stopped working last week. I've never used them at temps above 225 and always made sure there were no kinks in the wires. Didn't close the lid on the wires they were led through the hole designed for temp probes in the smoker. Also the magnet that holds the unit to the smoker is attached to the battery cover and always pulls the batteries out of their connections. Terrible design and junk.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Wurm

customer_reviews.title: Worked great out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Just used it for the first time. It was simple to set up and add the app to my phone. What's nice is you can monitor the temp of the meat while sitting inside (no need to constantly go out into the heat to check the temp). I've scanned the manual in case anyone needs one. Just note: the probes get VERY, VERY hot. So, if you need to adjust one in the middle of cooking, be sure to wear some type of protection for your fingers, otherwise the probe WILL burn you.
customer_reviews.author: N.D.B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and very accurate
customer_reviews.text: If you grill and want your meat cooked just right, this Grill Thermometer is outstanding. I have found it much more accurate and easier to use than the hand held digitals. The probes and cables easily withstand the heat. It is so convenient to stick the probe in the middle of the meat, put the meat on the grill and watch the display, or the App without having to mess around with the probe until the item to cooked. The App is pretty cool as well, with an alert when it reaches the temperature you preset. Also I find no issues with sticking the probes in once and flipping the meat, easy to do the and probe will stay in.
customer_reviews.author: Subdriver

customer_reviews.title: Great BBQ Thermometer
customer_reviews.text: Works excellent for ambient and internal temperature readings. Blue tooth feature and app make it easy to use. Distance from device with blue tooth connection is within reason and is similar to that of my AirPods. The screen lights up to make it easier to read at night for those long haul cookouts. The magnet on back is good enough to attach it to my grill. I added a photo of the app to help you find it as I had to search a little to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Senorita19

customer_reviews.title: Why did we wait so long???
customer_reviews.text: For those who grill, this product is perfect. I don't know why we waited so long. We often grill large pieces of meat. Hanging over a grill is NOT the most pleasant experience and a waste of time when you're trying to cook the rest of your dinner. I thought to myself - there must be a bluetooth thermometer that solves this problem. Of course, there were several. After reading several reviews, I picked this one. We have not been disappointed. The embedded temps seem right, but it is programmable if you have different tastes. Summer grilling just became easier for us.
customer_reviews.author: John Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Received just in time to smoke a 10# pork loin, making it into canadian bacon. Download of app was easy, connected via bluetooth as instructed. Set up the smoker and got started. Range of bluetooth was good, from the outside of the garage to anywhere in the house, including the basement. I verified the internal temp of the meat against 2 other thermometers, an instant read, and the one that was included with my smoker, all were within 1 or 2 degrees of each other, based on where they were inserted into the pork loin. Looking forward to many days of smoking, without having to run outside every 20 minutes to check the smoker and/or food tem!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice barbecue thermometer
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had it long but it seems to be close to my other temperature readings. This really frees you up to visit while you maintain control over the cooking. Ensures you don't over cook the meat or forget. No need to continually open the lid and check the grilling progress. Especially handy when cooking several different types of meat as it has up to 6 probes for monitoring. I may upgrade to 5 stars after I have used it more.
customer_reviews.author: Steve F

customer_reviews.title: Easy and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Oh man, where has this been all my smoking life?! Easy to read, easy to program (even for a technodinosaur like me). There are lots of meat/temp options already programmed in and additional probes - up to 6- are available for purchase. No more going back and forth to the smoker to check temps. Works great in the oven as well. Just be sure the colored beads (to differentiate the probes) are outside the smoker/oven. They don’t melt but they do change colors in the heat.
customer_reviews.author: MBR-OKC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a whim after we received our new Grilla Grill pellet smoker. I am so glad I did! Having it makes monitoring our cooks so much easier. I love that I can set it, go in the house, and forget about it until my phone alerts me. The alert is loud, which is great. I have noticed that there is about a 20 degree difference between what my internal grill probe reads versus what this probe reads as ambient temperature. I suspect this probe is more accurate since we’ve used it three times and everything came out fantastic, but it is something I suggest monitoring.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I'm about 3 months into owning this thermometer and so far, so good. I would say I've been using about twice a week, including some very long sessions with a smoker. For my smoker in particular, where temperature control is important, I can have it sound an alarm on my phone if the temperature falls outside of where I want it. This makes it way more convenient than wandering outside every 30 minutes to check the temperature.
customer_reviews.author: DavidElg

customer_reviews.title: Not for Android users
customer_reviews.text: The build is nice, temperature seems accurate and wuicm, but it's all brought down by a sub par app. While the app seems to work properly on iOS, it does not uodate via bluetooth after about 30 secondn Android, meaning no alerts if you meet your targets or if you lose connection. The only fix is the continually force close and restart the app. Looking at the app page on Google Play, this is not a new problem, and the last time an update was issued was June 2017. Returning and will be purchasing a Weber iGrill.
customer_reviews.author: teek

customer_reviews.title: great smoker thermometer
customer_reviews.text: This is my first wi fi capable thermometer. It will be hard not to have that feature now. I just downloaded the app and the rest was done for me. gives you the option to monitor six different temps remotely. set alarms for both time and temp. Mine is very accurate as I checked it with both of my manual thermometers. The range on the wifi is more than enough. With it in the smoker in the back yard, I can read it anywhere in the house or out in the front yard.
customer_reviews.author: JDL1950

customer_reviews.title: East setup
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. The set up was extremely easy and fast. The temperature response is Quick. Also the product itself seems to be well-made and solid. I have it in a couple of pork chops as I am writing this. Update: it worked flawlessly. The probe had gunk on it as I removed it from the chop and thought “this is going to be a mess, but it wiped right off like new!!!!” Just make sure Farenheit is selected, unlike me at first. I was wondering why the food was taking longer until I noticed “C” was displayed. Oh well, my bad. So easy to use anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Fairchild

customer_reviews.title: A great tool to use with my new smoker
customer_reviews.text: This unit provides accurate monitoring of the temperature of the cuts of meat I have smoked. The Bluetooth feature was easy to set up and can be customized to let you know when a desired temperature is achieved. It also has a range of approximately 30 feet, so you can monitor the temperature of your meat without getting smoked yourself. I have two probes (the unit has a maximum capacity of 6 probes) and when placed in a cut of meat, both of my probes recorded the exact same temperature. If you want to make your smoker even easier to use, I would recommend this great little tool.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki W.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: The app is probably required to use most of the functions. The default temperature unit is Celsius but once the app and device is paired it automatically updated to Fahrenheit (probably used phone's location to determine). Previously I would use an instant read thermometer after a set amount of time and add more time as needed. This was fine for chicken thighs or drum sticks but beef and other stuff took a lot of effort to not overcook.
customer_reviews.author: Le

customer_reviews.title: Great packaging and quality materials!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my NutriChef thermometer the other day and haven’t used it yet. I’m leaving this review based on initial impressions, packaging, etc. The packaging was nice and did a good job at protecting the equipment. The stainless steel probes are solid and good quality. Overall very happy with the quality of materials and packaging. I will update my review once I’ve used it for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ostrom

customer_reviews.title: Does not work! Do not trust your meat to it.
customer_reviews.text: This was a complete FAILURE on many levels. First off when getting use to the wireless thermometer i was not happy that I could not set my temp. Only use pre set temps for the variety of meats. Using it while smoking a brisket last night, the temps were all over the place. I checked to compare to my instant read hand thermometer and it was way off. In the last few hours of the smoke it was several HUNDRED degrees off and kept sending alarms. It was the worst product I have ever purchased on amazon by far!
customer_reviews.author: James S. Williams

customer_reviews.title: BBQ Thermometer is better than most
customer_reviews.text: Just received and tried my nurtichef BBQ Thermometer. This is my third one on so many years. I wanted it to show the temperature locally at the food as well as on my mobile phone. Some doe wither or. I was tired of the separate portable unit that never would sync. This worked perfect the first time. Setting up was a breeze and the mobile app gives a great deal of functionality that is easy to use. Prefer to set up the use by mobile app versus use the unit itself. Works great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Colkwlink

customer_reviews.title: Have tried them all
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the most versatile and well built grilling thermometer I have ever used. Have tried at least 5 other brands and this out does them all and then some. Well built, and very solid as far as the results. Never disconnects, always comes on when pressed and never ever has it failed me. Great accurate results. Going to buy 3 more for Christmas gifts, its that good. Also amazed at the price for the quality you get.
customer_reviews.author: WTR

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly every time
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Smart Bluetooth BBQ Grill thermometer for my boyfriend so that he would be able to grill with more confidence. He loves techie gadgets so I knew this would be perfect for him. I love that it sends him alerts on his phone of the internal temperature so everything comes out perfect, very first time, too. The probes are easy to clean, cords are long enough for his huge grill. He likes that there are multiple probes so he can grill different things and the accuracy is consistent. Very happy to be able to buy this item from Amazon and have it do everything it claims!
customer_reviews.author: Jolene Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy To Use and Works like a Charm!
customer_reviews.text: I hadn't even heard of this type of device but I came across it when I ordered my new pellet smoker. It couldn't have been easier to use. Popped the included batteries in, downloaded the app and it paired right from the app screen - I didn't even need to pair via bluetooth first (just made sure bluetooth was turned on, which it always is on my phone). I like that the probes are all stainless steel. It worked great, showing me that my chicken had reached 165 degrees even though I was monitoring from the other side of the house from the grill. Sure enough, when I pulled the food off the grill, it was cooked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Masen

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill Thermometer (updated 5/14/20)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband, who is a very picky tech person. He LOVES it! He made a pork shoulder that is the best he's ever done. He like that he didn't have to constantly check on it during it's slow roast and could just monitor it all from his phone. He can't wait to try it again! UPDATED 5/14/20: Well, it broke. Not even 6 months and it's not working. It will turn on but won't accurately track temperature. Now we have to find another one and hope we get our $$ worth.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Proski

customer_reviews.title: Stay away
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. This is the second one I’ve ordered. First one lasted two days and would not power up. The second one lasted a couple months and is reading very erratic temperatures. I’d return this one if it wasn’t past 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: Ezekiel Redden

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit 2 months ago. I've used it twice successfully and thought it was going to be a great sensor. Unfortunately, one of the sensors stopped working accurately on the 3rd use and the bluetooth stopped working on the 4th use.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Green

customer_reviews.title: A few quirks, but overall a really good product
customer_reviews.text: Setup was very easy. The product connects right away to the phone, which was my frustration with my previous paired temperature products. A single device with a single set of batteries is nice. The only reason I did not give it 5 stars is that it sounds an alarm every time you turn off the device notifying me that I lost connectivity. Not sure how to turn off the device without getting this alarm. You can turn off the notification in the app, but then you lose the functionality when you might actually need it.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy B.

customer_reviews.title: Eradicate temps
customer_reviews.text: I was initially pleased with the accuracy of the system, and the large display. Bluetooth works great and makes cooking meat easy and avoids over or under cooking. However now I get wide temp. readings, the temperature goes up wildly on one probe but not the other. Can no longer trust the readings, I have only used the system for 1 month and it had already disappointed me. Also the company promised me two extra probes if I left a positive review, then they tried to get me to except a worthless substitute, and never sent the probes. I
customer_reviews.author: Les P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time cooking things to the proper temperature. I also feel like stabbing it multiple times does not help. I used this thermometer in a pork tenderloin. I ran the wire outside the oven. I was able to monitor the temperature real time and stop at the proper time. The tenderloin came out perfect! I am very pleased with this thermometer. I can't wait to use it more.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Matheaus

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: Just smoked a brisket with one probe in the point and the other in the flat. I got an accurate reading of the temperature from my living room and kitchen. After a 9-hour cook, the batteries are still showing as full. I misread the product description when I ordered, and I thought it said Wi-Fi, but it doesn't use Wi-Fi, at least not quite. It's not bluetooth either, but instead it's a wireless connection which requires your phone to be in range in order to see the temperatures. I'm not sure what protocol or band it uses, to be honest. I didn't have any problems with the app or the device, and I'm satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great addition for grilling!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product with great versatility. Love that it enables six probes. Magnet works very well to setup for easy viewing of temps. Display constantly rotates to show temps of all probes. Would be better if it came with color coded clips for easy identification of the probes. There are only two colors for the probes but six ports. App is free and easy to use. Temperature presets are by food type with suggested temp. You can adjust temp to your liking.
customer_reviews.author: Black Knight

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for a Propane Smoker!
customer_reviews.text: This thing works amazing. Before I have been using a digital non bluetooth temp probe for my smoker to monitor temps. Using a non bluetooth is a huge hassle for long smokes. Having to run inside and out to check temps on the meat. This changes that. Being able to monitor the temps from my phone and use presets based on the meat is a huge advantage. Would highly recommend especially for the cost!
customer_reviews.author: sam_19

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first, so many of these Bluetooth things don't do half what they claim to do but this one proved to be an excellent purchase. I can put multiple items on the barbecue and go relax, it tells me on my phone when each item has reached the desired temperature so I don't have to keep running back and forth to check it which is great on these cold rainy nights. Just bought another one for my son in law...
customer_reviews.author: david l. schmedes

customer_reviews.title: Great first impression
customer_reviews.text: I just got this and tried it on out on my new Kamado Joe smoking a brisket. The brisket didn't turn out so well, since that was my first attempt, but this thermometer worked like a charm. Saved me from having to sit by the grill all day and I could get work done in my home office while dinner was cooking. The hardware appears to be high quality and the app is very nicely designed. I verified the accuracy of the probes in a pan of boiling water and they were accurate to within a few tenths of a degree, so I feel confident about the readings I'm getting. Overall, a very complete product at an attractive price.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Great device for broken grill thermometer
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got me this because the thermometer on my grill had become basically worthless. Since our kitchen was being remodeled, we have to cook virtually everything on the grill and I needed to be able to accurately gauge the temperature at which I was cooking the food. Also, since we were doing grill baking, I had to be able to monitor the food without opening the grill lid. This item fit the bill perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Not the man in the picture!

customer_reviews.title: 4 1/2 Stars
customer_reviews.text: We used this thermometer at Christmas when we roasted two tenderloins. Both came out perfectly. However, since then, there have been a couple of times where we felt like we were second guessing. The meat just didn't look done. Had to knock a little shine off one of the starts for that. The alert on the phone is great. Overall, a pretty darn nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline K. Reece

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: worked well for us. probes with heat-protected cables have color coded beads to help you track which probe read out is for which piece of meat without having trace cables each time. You can also set temperature alerts so you can take the meat off the heat at just the right time for the optimal tenderness as well as safety. Will be buying more probes because we are finding that two that are included simply aren't enough.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I love the two probes, one for your food and the other for the grill temperature. Bluetooth range is great, I get it on my phone in my front yard with the grill in the back. Also it comes with a probe holder to attach to the grill which is very useful. App connects quickly and has basic functionality. I do wish the app had a few more advanced settings, like see historical readings, and to stop the alarm beeping on the unit from the app.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham Male

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product that is easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: After years of many electronic thermometers I have used, I bought and have used this item twice so far. Loved it! I particularly like the construction of the probes. It was simple to operate on my android phone after I found I had to tap items to find input areas. It connected instantly to my bluetooth connection and it alarmed at the time the cooking temperature was reached. It even alarmed when I turned it off while it was connected to my cellphone. After reading comments prior to buying, several reviews do not apparently apply to this product since the instructions do not mention wireless wifi connection. I wanted bluetooth anyway so no problem!
customer_reviews.author: Marv

customer_reviews.title: Awesome thermometer and a little familiar
customer_reviews.text: Love this thermometer! I bought a this because my InkBird thermometer was beginning to give inaccurate readings and needed something new. When I got this and downloaded the app I found it is exactly like the BBQGo app I used with the InkBird. Not a bad thing but found it funny. I don't even care if this product is a new InkBird, I loved that thermometer too just was getting old. Very well done folks and definitely an upgrade!
customer_reviews.author: Aleesia Thomas

customer_reviews.title: The app is pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this product a lot, it makes grilling a lot easier and my steaks and fish a lot better. The cables look very resistant (I made it to melt the cables of my previous thermometer!) and the app is really good! The only thing I dislike is that if you don't place it correctly in the meat, the accuracy is not as good, and I wish it was wireless, but those are factors I knew about when making this purchase. Overall very happy with the product and price!
customer_reviews.author: Marion Demons

customer_reviews.title: The app has an easy interface and the range for Bluetooth connection is great!
customer_reviews.text: My hubby and son bought this for my birthday. I have a Masterbuilt Dual Fuel smoker and the thermometer is not accurate. I am cooking my brisket as I am writing this review and I received a message from the app that my smoker temperature was out of range! The Bluetooth range is great I live in a multi level home and I have not lost Bluetooth connection within my home. I love this! It’s a perfect gift for any level!
customer_reviews.author: SWEETANGELH

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: We have had one of these for about 2 years and love it. Super simple to use and you don't have to open the oven to check the temperature. We like it so much we bought one for our daughter for Christmas. I could not rate the temperature control since the thermometer doesn't control the temperature. It monitors the temp. The oven controls the temp.
customer_reviews.author: Frustrated Music Teacher

customer_reviews.title: 6 input  blue tooth temperature monitor with alarms - works really good.
customer_reviews.text: Used for the first time today with my smoker, the unit is very easy to use, the iphone app works very well, temperature readings appear to be accurate and consistent, i purchased 2 additional probes, used one to monitor smoker temperature and the other 3 for meat temperature, i am very happy with the purchase, i can walk away from the smoker and still monitor temperatures, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BCoop

customer_reviews.title: Great Thermometer
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product as my first bbq thermometer, it was easy to set up and the app is pretty straight forward. I like that it does not require any log in or account set up before use. The display is simple to read and again pretty straight forward. The thermometer is accurate, within 1-2 degrees. The only reason this did not get a 5 star review is that the instructions do not clearly indicate how to get the bluetooth to pair with the app. *To do this I had to turn the display on, then press the power button repeatedly to get this to connect. Once it is paired it connects right away though.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time. After downloading app and powering on thermometer setup took less than a minute. Durable construction great, connectivity. Long probes wires. It came with clip allowing to mount probe inside the grill or smoker to monitor pit temperature. App has everything you need. Preset temperatures for different type of meats and even smoke temperatures (BBQ, Hot smoke and cold smoke). It comes with two probes but total 6 can be connected. Very happy with buy finally don’t need to go out every few minutes to check on smoker
customer_reviews.author: Grzegorz D.

customer_reviews.title: Great so far! Accurate and reasonably easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work great so far! Took a bit of time to figure out how the Bluetooth connection works. The app works fine for me, though there a few interface oddities that could be improved. (the "Done" indicator is always present in grey, turning red when the selected item is actually at temperature, which is a little confusing on first glance).
customer_reviews.author: T. Swett

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, accurate, preset-temperature alarm is an important function.
customer_reviews.text: The Smart Wireless BBQ Thermometer is very easy to setup. The temperature readings are very accurate by cross-checking with another ordinary probe and the discrepancy of reading values of the three are one degree or less. Preset alarm temperature works very well and reliable. The only part that needs improvement is the Probe Wrap which seems too small, thinking who has the patience to coil it all the way back. So the wrap needs to be doubled in its size.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy To Use
customer_reviews.text: I've been doing the ol' grilling thing all wrong. Did some Ribeye's for Mothers day. Everyone wanted their steaks done to a different doneness....cooked them low and slow....as each one hit the right temp...took of off the grill...let it rest for 10 min...then reversed seared them. The temp probes makes it possible to "KNOW WHEN" to pull. No more guessing.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Great Grilling Thermometer
customer_reviews.text: For me, this is a very useful tool. I use it for thick meats and for cooking half chickens. They have come out great every time. It is critical to locate the probe in the right place. Bluetooth range is good for our house. I checked the probe by inserting it in boiling water. It registered 210 degrees. Good enough for me. I wish there was a way to turn down the alarm. It sounds like a firm alarm and is too loud.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence C. Bieber

customer_reviews.title: If you’re lookin’, you ain’t cookin’
customer_reviews.text: This remote does everything about monitoring my grill that I need. Multiple sensors allow me to watch different items in the grill as well as the grill temperature itself, all from the comfort of my sofa without periodically running outside. Each sensor can be set for a different alarm setting by time or temperature. The accompanying software runs on Android or Apple devices. Easy to read and use.
customer_reviews.author: Cooking Texan

customer_reviews.title: So Far, So Good
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a wireless thermometer that I could get a graph from my phone. Since the wifi thermometers were out of the price range, this one works nicely via bluetooth and its 1/10 the price. Comes with two probes and the setup was pretty easy. Will have to see how well it works in the smoker this weekend!
customer_reviews.author: AliBaba

customer_reviews.title: Fast Deliver easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Got unit, not used yet. easy to set up app (don't work without it!) Not impressed that max time to set for smoking is only 240 minutes.. NO HOURS display.. Not good when trying to smoke a turkey for 66-8 hours, looks like you have to reset every 4 hours. we will see hoe it goes.. will update as need later.. Nice unit, seems sturdy..
customer_reviews.author: skydiver

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, changing the way you bbq!
customer_reviews.text: Had this up and running within minutes of taking out of the package. Very little set up and worked like a charm. I used in my smoker and could still be connected on phone while sitting inside about 50 ft away. Live in AZ and in the summer this is a lifesaver not having to go out in the heat every 20 minutes to test. Wish the heat chart persisted the entire cooking time but I had to run to the store at some point and the chart reset when I reconnected. But highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: DealBuggie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome thermometer multiple probes are great!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great thermometer. We have gone through so many over the years. This one is worth the money. The Bluetooth capability is awesome. Having multiple probes is even better. Being able to cook different foods at different temperatures while not having to take probes in and out of meats is really nice. I made beef Wellington with it the first use and they came out perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an older digital thermometer with this. Quite an improvement. Can use multiple probes. I use one for the meat temperature and one for the ambient temperature. Seems to give more accurate and frequent temperature updates as my old probe would not. Connects to my iPhone without issue, just need to have bluetooth on. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff L.

customer_reviews.title: Some Design Flaws
customer_reviews.text: Device has magnetic backing that places magnet right above battery. Needless to say some may think that their device is not functioning when it's the battery being pulled away enough to lose power. The other issue I have is the device itself fell after a small nudge enough that the small clip keeping the back on busted. Device still works just not as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Gray

customer_reviews.title: Easy to track BBQ temperature
customer_reviews.text: Works great for me. Magnetic base attaches to my grill stand, but base also has silicon rubber so does not slip on table. Multiple probes helpful for different temperature goals, or tracking grill air temperature. Only have the two supplied so far. Changes to setpoint goals delete data to that point, minor issue. Have stayed within 20ft, so not pushing the wireless range. Would be nice if the App estimated time to reach setpoint temperature. Have even taken it on vacation (in checked bag -- probes probably not acceptable for carry-on). Very visible display, and plenty loud audible alert.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P.

customer_reviews.title: Use only one at a Time
customer_reviews.text: I get 2 free probes with a good product review but the instructions are less than great (I have two of these and you can ONLY pair 1) so I found out by trial and error that you must delete one in order to pair the other. I sent one back before I found this out and the return policy SUCKS - I only will get $3.99 credit for $10 postage. All because the instructions don't talk about multiple devices. But overall the device is a good buy (much better than the Weber igrill2 which won't pair with Android 8.0 devices).
customer_reviews.author: DAVID

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth Thermometer!! Buy now!!
customer_reviews.text: This digital, Bluetooth enabled, neat thermometer is AWESOME! It is described perfectly and right out of the box worked perfectly. I cooked some sirloins on my new Traeger and this got thermometer got them just right. Very easy to use and read. The app is great and does exactly what it needs to do. I had no problem connecting it to my phone. This does NOT claim to be WiFi enabled and that’s correct, you cannot connect it to your WiFi. Don’t try to leave home and expect to see your temperatures on your phone, only Bluetooth. Really good thermometer for what you spend, I highly suggest it.
customer_reviews.author: colbylane27

customer_reviews.title: Must have for smoker/bbw
customer_reviews.text: Doing long slow smoking of meats are now a joy, because I am no longer making unnecessary trips to the smoker. With one probe monitoring the smoke chamber, and another in the meat the phone app will alert you when temperatures fall out of range. Alerts can be set for a temperature range or a fixed point. With up to 6 input probes, this unit can keep up with the busiest grill. The 4 ft probe cables are the perfect length, and they have a very nice storage yoke so you don't end up with a tangled mess when you put thing away,
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Let the thermometer do its thing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this piece of equipment after receiving a PitBoss Pellet smoker for Father's Day. Tried this thermometer and I am convinced! Accurate, timely with alarm and clear to the user interface. Rule t follow is that it may give you the impression that its not working, but meat tends to get to a stall and the thermometer will not budge. Wait for it...then pow! Alarm sounds because the meat surpassed the stall and you are then blessed with a wonderfully cooked meat of your choice. No matter what size!
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Bolden

customer_reviews.title: Love the flexibility!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the flexibility of the Nutrichef Smart Wireless BBQ Thermometer. I can use it with my phone through bluetooth or I can use it from the the device display on my BBQ. It comes with two probes which are very handy for keeping an eye on two different kinds of meat or two pieces of the same meat. I'm getting some more probes to take more advantage of its capabilities. The easyBBQ Bluetooth APP is very easy to use and powerful for setting alerts on each probe and checking all the probe temperatures at a glance. Just made a terrific London Broil with it today; it was cooked perfectly medium rare.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Easiest bluetooth connection on my iPhone 8
customer_reviews.text: Downloading the easy BBQ app and pairing with my iPhone 8 was without a doubt the easiest and quickest bluetooth/iphone connection ever. The operating instructions were easy to follow so selecting the proper cooking temperature was a breeze. I specially liked the temperature pre-selects for the various meats etc and the fact that I had the ability to vary the temperature manually if so desired. I received the wireless thermometer early this afternoon and used it to grill filet's shortly thereafter. My initial experience was a truly pleasant one. Looking forward to trying the device on my Traeger smoker this coming Memorial Day.
customer_reviews.author: Moon Man

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth ability big plus
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. We tested out the temperature accuracy last night in the oven and outside and it was within a degree of what both thermometers read. I love that this unit sends temperature readings to our cell phone with a warning buzzer so if we are sidetracked with our guests we will be sure not to overcook dinner.
customer_reviews.author: repeat_offender75

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband for Christmas, next year will be a Hyundai but until then, he is very pleased with this product. Used to smoke a Christmas ham and wow! It turned out so delicious! He loved that he was able to check the temperature on his smartphone and didn’t have to brave the cold to check! Bought one for my father and father in law and it was a hit all around. Would definitely recommend to anyone who likes to grill.
customer_reviews.author: Laken Henry

customer_reviews.title: Temperature reading is waaaay off.
customer_reviews.text: Cut the prime rib at Christmas dinner expecting perfection and it it was overcooked! Used another thermometer & discovered the reading was off by 9 degrees. HUGE disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: kbogo

customer_reviews.title: A must have for the barbque Dad
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely loves this gadget. He received a smoker for birthday so he has been going between grill and smoker, has probes for temperature tracking in different items. He can track on phone, which he has been showing me every time he cooks now:) Great gadget/gift for the dad who doesn’t want to make hockey pucks for dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Doria K. Hairston

customer_reviews.title: Works well, couple small quirks but overall great buy for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, reads temps and connects to the phone app well. I really like the temp graph readout as well, and bring able to see all temps on one screen. I don't like how loud and annoying the alarm was on my phone but it was easy to change it to vibrate. It would be nice not to have to set a temp goal to start the graph logging but I can work around it.
customer_reviews.author: David Bush

customer_reviews.title: stopped functioning after 5 normal uses
customer_reviews.text: Was not quick or accurate before it stopped functioning. This was the worst purchase I have ever made on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Sceptor

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement to another meat thermometer that went out. I thought I was ordering the same one I was replacing but found it was not. They showed to be the same with same pricing but were different. This one works fine and would have received 5 stars if it came with more than two meat probes. It has ports for 6 but they only send 2. Luckily my old thermometer's meat probes work in this one.
customer_reviews.author: UnclePoPo

customer_reviews.title: Registration review, updated! Still waiting on the extra probes
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used it yet, registration required a review. Update it worked great, nice timer and temperature graph feature on each probe input!! Update: never got promised extra probes after completing product review!!!!! Update #2: still never got promised extra probes
customer_reviews.author: Jose A. Carrillo

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with the wires and your grill / smoker door
customer_reviews.text: I used these for the first time this past weekend and they worked really well. Pairing it with the app was great so I could be inside my house when needed and still be able to monitor. The only issue was essentially my fault. I have a heavy door to my smoker that is 1/4" steel and I let it slam down one time instead of gently closing it. The wire flattened out and was a little hit and miss at that point to still get a reading. However, I moved the wire to where a portion of the wire was undamaged was under the lid and it operated fine again. Learn from my mistake and close your door gently!
customer_reviews.author: Tania Cox

customer_reviews.title: An excellent addition to the cooking arsenal
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thermometer specifically for use during a pig roast. I was able to monitor both the meat and the temperature of the roasting box at the same time. The thermometer is easy to use and the screen is clear for feedback. Though I would recommend a couple of updates to the mobile app it worked adequately as is. I would highly recommend this thermometer to anyone who monitors their cooking closely.
customer_reviews.author: Frank H. Cole IV

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works just as expected. The app was easily downloaded and connected via Bluetooth to my phone. It alerts you when you get out of range.. super easy to read screen that toggles back and forth between probes you have in. I set the temp alarm for my turkey and it went off right on time.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Kuhlman

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for but...
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived on time and works as advertised (so far). Your package will likely come with an "offer" for 2 extra free probes if you submit an amazon review (hence why there is likely so many reviews). Don't waste your time the contact email address is not deliverable. 5 stars for the product working so far as advertised 3 stars for wasting my time jumping through hoops for the "free offer".
customer_reviews.author: MDU

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a thermometer that would easily interface with my phone. Downloaded the EasyBBQ app and it works great with my phone. It has several nice features such as target temp and the ability to set timed intervals/alarms. Eager to put it to work. Used it with chicken and jalapeño poppers. The probs worked great and the interface with the smartphone is great. The app is a little wonkie in areas, but still great overall.
customer_reviews.author: Customer X

customer_reviews.title: Quit looking, get this one!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Made my life much easier, no more lifting the lid to poke at the meat letting all the heat out! Great quality, I’m really impressed with the weight as well as the braided cable wires. Easy to download app, then let the probes go to work. No more guessing, more beer drinking, and enjoying my time. Also just surprised myself, it has a magnetic backing built-in to stick on cool part of my Treager! Will buy from this company again for other products. They did the work for us in the app, amazing product! Two thumbs up, and a SNAP!! Lol!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Taking your grilling to the next level!
customer_reviews.text: If you want to take your grilling to the next level, this is a must get product. During this time of the Coronavirus I have been doing a lot more grilling. This product is very useful gauging the temperature. It’s very easy and accurate. My meat never tasted so well. I love the convenience of being able to see how my temperature is doing without going outside. The app is very easy to setup on your phone. This is a very user friendly product. The product delivers! It’s worth the investment if you are a serious griller.
customer_reviews.author: BEN A. SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Worst customer service ever!
customer_reviews.text: Product stopped working after only a few uses. Tried to make a claim and was told that I must use the manufacturer warranty first. Called the manufacturer an after 45 minutes of waiting on hold was hung up on. Called back and 35 minutes later was hung up on again. Cannot get a hold of anyone, they just bounce you around through their automated phone system, make you wait on hold forever, then disconnect you once you reach "first in line" to be answered. Product worked very well until it didnt work at all. Customer service is the absolute worst!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Long

customer_reviews.title: Nailed it!
customer_reviews.text: Getting the meat "just right" has always been my major problem with barbecuing. I've tried a number of different meat thermometers in the past and none of them have really worked for me. They were inaccurate, clunky, hard to read, the alerts not loud enough, etc. The Smart Bluetooth BBQ Grill Thermometer does everything it promises, and let's me "watch over" the grill on a hot, summer day from inside my air-conditioned home. The Easy BBQ app was easy to load, and it set itself up. The alarm goes off at just the right moment, the moment the meat is perfectly cooked... and I take all the credit!
customer_reviews.author: Virtual Sidekick

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift Ever
customer_reviews.text: Best gift ever! We struggle with the temps on our grill food every time we grill! Between fish and burgers it’s hard to keep it all straight...this little gadget makes life so simple! I can sit in my living room while this does most the work! The app is very user friendly and super easy to set it all up. The only problem now is my dad wants one too!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: NutriChef Smart Bluetooth BBQ Grill Thermometer - Upgraded Stainless Dual Probes Safe to Leave in Outdoor Barbecue Meat Smoker - Wireless Remote Alert iOS Android Phone WiFi App, One Size, PWIRBBQ80
product_meta.description: Style Name:Multi ProbeNutriChef Model : PWIRBBQ80 Bluetooth Wireless BBQ Digital Thermomet Bluetooth Wireless BBQ Digital Thermometer Features: HassleFree; Wireless Smart Thermometer Get Connected; See the Temperature on Your Smartphone Insert the Probes for Accurate; Reliable Temp Readouts Super Easy Setup with Bluetooth Pairing Digital LCD Display Screen MultiTemp Reading: View the Readout of Up to (6) Probes Includes (2) Temperature Probes Battery Operated Design Perfect for Backyard BBQ GrillingThe;EasyBBQ; App: View Your Temperature History Timeline Displays RealTime Temperature Uniqu;Target Temperature; Setting Alarm; Alert Notifications Free to Download Available for iPhone; Android What;s in the Box: Smart BBQ Thermometer (2) Temperature Probes ;AA; BatteriesTechnical Specs: Selectable Temperature Units: Fahrenheit / Celsius Max Probe Temperature: 482 ;F Max Stainless Steel Cable Temperature: 716;F Battery Operated: Requires (2) x ;AA; Batteries Bluetooth Support: Version 4.0 ; Later Smartphone Support: iPhones 4s, Android 4.3 ; Later Outdoor Wireless Range: 200+ ft Indoor Wireless Range: 100+ ft Temperature Probe Construction: Stainless Steel *Avoid Placing Directly Over Open Flames Dimensions (L x W x H): 3.7; x 3.3;; x 1.5;; Warning Do not use in open flame Probes are safe to leave in oven, smoker, grill or BBQ and withstand temp to 482 F Stainless steel cable can withstand temp to 716 F Battery operated: requires (2) x 'AA' batteries included Introducing NutriChef;s PWIRBBQ80 Our complete smart solution for stress free BBQ remote monitoring. Download the iOS and Android compatible ;EasyBBQ; mobile app and get push notifications alerts as soon as your food reaches the desired cooking temperature. Great for baking, grilling and even smoking Set a time alarm and monitor fluctuations in temperature for a perfect smoke. Get smart features without forgetting simplicity. The convenient tabletop console has a digital display allowing you to quickly glance at the current temperature without pulling out your phone. The mobile app features allow you to walk away from the kitchen without ruining your meat.
feature_bullets: 2020 UPGRADED STAINLESS STEEL PROBES: Safely leave heavy duty metal probes inside any oven or grill for the entire cook duration. Probe can withstand high heat temp of up to 482 F and stainless steel cable wire up to 716 F

328’ OUTDOOR WIRELESS RANGE: Professional smart cordless grilling kit and accessories. Get an instant push notification to your smartphone if the chef leaves the cell phone wireless bluetooth range. Indoor range is 100’

DONE SMARTPHONE ALARM: When the sensor detects the steak or meat reaches the set temperature the Apple iPhone iOS or Android WiFi mobile app will send push notifications and sound pocket alarm to take meat from gas or charcoal BBQ, smoker or oven

6 PROBE SIMULTANEOUS MONITORING: Comes shipped with 2 probes but add up to 4 more! Remote monitor food temperatures in either Celsius or Fahrenheit and get multi alerts. adjust and save pro cooking presets for your favorite kitchen recipes

INSTANT READ DIGITAL DISPLAY: Large electric backlit LCD display can be held or set on adjustable surface stand and is great for quickly glancing at the smoke or cook timer progress. Digital display will automatically cycle between both the readings

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars3,742 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
